section.p: To run the jerk, simply type:
Once the jerk has connected, assuming he's using the nickname jerk, you can communicate with him either through private /msg jerk commands or public in-channel commands.

section.name: Join
section.p: The following command can be issued to the jerk privately to instruct him to join a particular channel.

section.name: Part
section.p: The following command can be issued to the jerk privately to instruct him to part a particular channel.

section.name: Start
section.p: The following command can be issued to the jerk within a channel to instruct him to start a service.

section.name: Stop
section.p: The following command can be issued to the jerk within a channel to instruct him to stop a service.
